name: GLASS SLIPPER 50
notes:
VDS design #38.
One of the earliest fiberglass yachts of this size. The first was reportedly built by Mr. Tyler, for his own use.

Early models had a wood deck and coach roof, as shown here.
Later versions were all fiberglass. 

Aft cabin/center cockpit and keel/cb versions were produced.
Some were finished at Anstey Yachts in the UK and intended for the charter trade.
